regen.absent_element: situation of displaying the total number of items
regen.new_specification: The shopping cart will clearly display the total number of items.

regen.absent_element: situation of removing products when quantity is zero or product does not exist in cart
regen.new_specification: The system shall prevent removal of products from the shopping cart if the quantity is zero or the product does not exist in the cart, and display an appropriate message to the customer.

regen.absent_element: situation of removing products from the shopping cart
regen.new_specification: When a customer removes a product from the shopping cart, the system shall update the total number of items and the overall cost accordingly.

label: The shopping cart will display the number of items in the cart
absence: action of displaying the number of items
